Ped Ishwar ke banaye hue hain.
Woh vasant ki hariyaali muskaan nahi thi.
Kanghi tumhare boote ke baahar hai.
Kyun ab dekh bhi nahi sakta kya.
Usne Jantar Mantar sab kuch chaat daala.
Ek saal mein hariyaali ho gayi.
Use aaj bhi vishwas nahin hota hai.
Apne mein bharipuri aur tust thi.
Uski aankh bachakar nikal sakta hai.
